section.p: It looks slightly askew to you, as if the beacon is in the wrong place. 'You might be right, cap'n,' says the first mate, 'but then again, it is said the reefs and rocks of the bay can change position - perhaps the beacon's been moved to take that into account.'
'Bah,' says the helmsman. 'You're the most superstitious man I ever served under! Who ever heard of rocks and reefs moving?'
